fluid.description: The namespace and ID of the fluid tag of which the height should be checked. Most important examples: `minecraft:water` and `minecraft:lava`.
fluid.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the fluid tag of which the height should be checked. Most important examples: `minecraft:water` and `minecraft:lava`.

comparison.description: How the fluid height should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the fluid height should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the fluid height should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the fluid height should be compared to.
